amendment.description: Amendment establishes criminal penalties for those who conspire to violate presidential campaign spending limits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to establish criminal penalties for violating the spending limits applicable to the candidate under the Federal Election Campaign Act.

action.text: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Stearns to the Shays amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
